entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
title: Intoduction

Welcome to Ling MA’s Blog Ling MA! It is my first blog. Check documentation for more infomation.

My works

Visual Reality

-Mobile Application, Android

I finished it when I was learning French in Lille 1, I used open source for simplify the process of developpement.

I created it, first reason, to get my diploma of french language. The second reason, I think it is very interesting.It has a french name: “Pédomètre en réalité visuel.”

I chose the topic because it is very hot in these years and the works of vistual reality is too heavy to wear. I want to creat a convenient and intresting application.

It is a pedometer in visual reality. It will change the landscape when you change your position. I used the sensors in the mobile so it is easy for it to feel the change.

Download my work and have a try: PV

AMPL

It is a Mathematical Programming Language for descpribe and solve the complex math problems. It don’t have complex grammars and it is very useful.For half of years of learning, I master it.

Download my work and have a try: AMPL

C

-programme du système

These job is learing how to programme in systerm Linux.
-Standard input and output
-Memory Management
-Document Management
-Directory Management
-Signal
-Tube
-Thread

Download my works and have a try: PDS

Java

-includes Object Oriented Design

-Decrecter Parttern
-Vistor Parttern
-Factory Parttern
-Observer Parttern
-Composite Parttern
-Singleton Parttern

Download my works and have a try: OOD

PostgreSQL

-Database(Base de donées)

-RA ( use algebraic expression)
-Creat,update, altern ,delete database.
-Design database
-Find the targets(select phrase)

Download my works and have a try: DB

Prezi and Focusky

I love to creat 3D and dynamic presentations. Because it looks delicate and interesting!
Download my work and have a look: Presentation
